          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594617360000,
          "parent_id": "a2de026a-ae05-42cf-9e7c-5636f189d286",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "// draws an ellipse based on x,y being top-left coordinate\nfunction drawEllipse(x,y,width,height){\n    var PI2=Math.PI*2;\n    var ratio=height/width;\n    var radius=Math.max(width,height)/2;\n    var increment = 1 / radius;\n    var cx=x+width/2;\n    var cy=y+height/2;\n    \n    ctx.beginPath();\n    var x = cx + radius * Math.cos(0);\n    var y = cy - ratio * radius * Math.sin(0);\n    ctx.lineTo(x,y);\n\n    for(var radians=increment; radians<PI2; radians+=increment){ \n        var x = cx + radius * Math.cos(radians);\n        var y = cy - ratio * radius * Math.sin(radians);\n        ctx.lineTo(x,y);\n     }\n\n    ctx.closePath();\n    ctx.stroke();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 3
        }
      },
      "bfa6c3cb-ca8a-430b-b8b3-f33262ddd884": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "created_by_table": "notion_user",

          "ignore_block_count": true,

          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594617360000,
          "parent_id": "a2de026a-ae05-42cf-9e7c-5636f189d286",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "// draws an ellipse based on cx,cy being ellipse's centerpoint coordinate\nfunction drawEllipse2(cx,cy,width,height){\n    var PI2=Math.PI*2;\n    var ratio=height/width;\n    var radius=Math.max(width,height)/2;\n    var increment = 1 / radius;\n\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    var x = cx + radius * Math.cos(0);\n    var y = cy - ratio * radius * Math.sin(0);\n    ctx.lineTo(x,y);\n\n    for(var radians=increment; radians<PI2; radians+=increment){ \n        var x = cx + radius * Math.cos(radians);\n        var y = cy - ratio * radius * Math.sin(radians);\n        ctx.lineTo(x,y);\n     }\n\n    ctx.closePath();\n    ctx.stroke();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 3
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
  }
}
